title: Hydroponics 101: What we grow | CropKing Inc.

tasks.task: Hydroponic farming tour and crop demonstration
subtasks: Walking through the Experimental Greenhouse at Crop King
Explaining the nutrient film technique (NFT) system
Discussing growing lettuce through NFT with seed to harvest timeline
Introducing different crops grown hydroponically (tomatoes, melons, cucumbers, cantaloupe)
Describing the Beto bucket system for vine crops
Highlighting the controlled environment of the tomato house (temperature, water, nutrients)
Addressing plant pollination methods (bumblebees, Veggie Bee, electric toothbrush)
Emphasizing year-round growing capability and versatility of hydroponic farming

tasks.task: All the subtasks included here are based on the given transcript. The MAINTASK is to follow a hydroponic farming tour and crop demonstration. Each subtask from 'walking through the Experimental Greenhouse' to 'emphasizing year-round growing' is represented. The transcript discusses various aspects of hydroponic farming, from different systems (NFT and Beto) to crop varieties and pollination methods, which are all covered in the subtasks. Hence, the answer correctly distills the key points from the provided transcript. Note that the transcript is quite rich in details about hydroponic practices, making several specific tasks possible. Other options may have been too broad or too narrow in scope.
